items.title: Tilda Swinton tackles life, death, and choice in 'The Room Next Door'
items.author: Associated Press
items.content:
Tilda Swinton says Pedro Almodóvar's "The Room Next Door" is about idea of letting people die on their own terms — and much more.
#tildaswinton #theroomnextdoor #shorts

items.title: AP Top Stories December 26 A
items.author: Associated Press
items.content:
Here's the latest for Thursday, Dec. 26th: Candlelight vigil in Thailand on 20th anniversary of tsunami; Day of mourning in Azerbaijan for Kazakhstan plane crash; Christmas shooting at Phoenix airport; Friday’s Mega Millions jackpot up to $1.15 billion.

items.title: Christmas shooting at Phoenix airport leaves several people wounded
items.author: Associated Press
items.content:
Police are investigating a Christmas shooting at Sky Harbor Airport in Phoenix that left three people injured by gunfire and another person stabbed.

Subscribe: http://smarturl.it/AssociatedPress
Read more: https://apnews.com​

This video may be available for archive licensing via https://newsroom.ap.org/home

items.title: Iraqi security chief meets Syria's rebel leader in Damascus
items.author: Associated Press
items.content:
Iraqi intelligence chief Hamid al-Shatri met on Thursday in Damascus with Ahmad al-Sharaa, leader of Hayat Tahrir al-Sham, or HTS, the Syrian insurgent group that overthrew ousted president Bashar Assad on December 8.

Subscribe: http://smarturl.it/AssociatedPress
Read more: https://apnews.com​

This video may be available for archive licensing via https://newsroom.ap.org/home

items.title: At least 6,000 prisoners escape maximum prison in Mozambique
items.author: Associated Press
items.content:
Mozambique’s police chief has said that at least 6,000 inmates have escaped from a high-security prison in the capital on Christmas Day after a rebellion, as widespread post-election riots and violence continue to engulf the country. (AP video by Lurdes Magaia)

Subscribe: http://smarturl.it/AssociatedPress
Read more: https://apnews.com​

This video may be available for archive licensing via https://newsroom.ap.org/home

items.title: LIVE: Thailand marks 20 years since the 2004 Indian Ocean tsunami
items.author: Associated Press
items.content:
A 9.1 magnitude earthquake struck off the coast of the Indonesian island of Sumatra on Dec. 26, 2004, triggering a tsunami that killed around 230,000 people across a dozen countries in one of modern history’s worst natural disasters. The tsunami claimed the lives of over 8,000 people in Thailand, including many who remain missing, leaving deep scars. Read more here: https://bit.ly/4gtQtw1

#thailand #tsunami #live

items.title: Candlelight vigil marks 20th anniversary of tsunami in Thailand
items.author: Associated Press
items.content:
A candlelight vigil was held on Thursday in the Thai village of Ban Nam Khem to mark 20 years since the massive Indian Ocean tsunami hit the region in one of modern history’s worst natural disasters. (AP video shot by Tian Macleod Ji)

Subscribe: http://smarturl.it/AssociatedPress
Read more: https://apnews.com​

This video may be available for archive licensing via https://newsroom.ap.org/home

items.title: Sacred to Indigenous people, peyote is threatened by psychedelic renaissance and development
items.author: Associated Press
items.content:
Peyote, a cactus containing mescaline, is sacred to many Indigenous people. It's being threatened by over harvesting, drug decriminalization laws and psychedelic use. Members of the Native American Church agree the plant must be protected, but differ on how to accomplish this. (AP Video: Jessie Wardarski)

#psychedelic #peyote #nativeamerican #news 

Subscribe: http://smarturl.it/AssociatedPress
Read more: https://apnews.com​

This video may be available for archive licensing via https://newsroom.ap.org/home

items.title: Myha’la calls her 'Industry' role a 'happy accident'
items.author: Associated Press
items.content:
Myha’la, one of AP’s Breakthrough Entertainers of 2024, calls her TV/film career a “happy accident.” She shines as Harper Stern in the breakout third season of HBO's "Industry."
#industry #myhala #hbo #shorts

items.title: Mourning for 8 Palestinians killed by Israeli military operations in West Bank
items.author: Associated Press
items.content:
People on Thursday mourned eight Palestinians killed by Israeli military operations in and around the city of Tulkarem in the northern West Bank on Tuesday, according to the Palestinian Health Ministry. (AP video shot by Aref Tufaha; Production by Jalal Bwaitel)

#israelhamaswar #palestinian #westbank #news

items.title: Pope Francis opens holy door in Rome's penitentiary
items.author: Associated Press
items.content:
Pope Francis inaugurated his Holy Year at Rome’s main prison on Thursday, bringing a message of hope to inmates and involving them in the Catholic Church’s once every quarter-century celebration that is expected to bring about 32 million pilgrims to Rome.

#catholicchurch #popefrancis #rome #news 

Subscribe: http://smarturl.it/AssociatedPress
Read more: https://apnews.com​

This video may be available for archive licensing via https://newsroom.ap.org/home

items.title: Day of mourning in Azerbaijan for victims of Kazakhstan plane crash
items.author: Associated Press
items.content:
Azerbaijan on Thursday observed a nationwide day of mourning for the victims of the air crash that killed 38 people and left all 29 survivors injured as speculation mounted about a possible cause of the crash that remained unknown. Read more: https://bit.ly/4087Lt6

#azerbaijan #kazakhstan #planecrash #news

items.title: LIVE: Kilauea volcano eruption in Hawaii
items.author: Associated Press
items.content:
Live view as lava bubbles through the crust of one of the world’s most active volcanoes — Kilauea — on Hawaii’s Big Island. The eruption is confined to the volcano’s summit caldera, in a remote, closed area of Hawaii Volcanoes National Park, the Hawaii Volcano Observatory reported.

#hawaii #volcano #live

items.title: Indians and Sri Lankans mark 20 years since Indian Ocean tsunami
items.author: Associated Press
items.content:
People gathered in India and Sri Lanka on Thursday to mark 20 years since the Indian Ocean tsunami struck , killing thousands of people.
(AP video shot by Mahesh Kumar and Eranga Jayawardena)

#tsunami #indianocean #india #srilanka #news

items.title: LIVE: Vigil in Thailand on 20th anniversary of 2004 Indian Ocean tsunami
items.author: Associated Press
items.content:
A vigil is held in Thailand as people mark 20 years since the massive 2004 Indian Ocean tsunami that killed some 230,000 people across a dozen countries, making it one of modern history’s worst natural disasters. Read more here: https://bit.ly/4gtQtw1

#thailand #tsunami #live
